Room.Name: Nobunaga's Tent
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the luxurous tent of Nobunaga the orcish paladin.
Room.LongDescription: Nobunaga nevers buys or sells anything, but he loves to trade. If you have anything he might like, make him an offer. He often will trade just for the pleasure of trading. Nobunaga and his buddies sometimes come here to drink the dwarve's Ulandian rum.
